title: HILARIOUS SWORD COMBAT - Reverence: The Ultimate Combat Experience Gameplay
description:
Reverence: The Ultimate Combat Experience Gameplay - Today we are trying out a new game!  This is a Sword fighting game that is compatible for VR devices.  Enjoy the Video :D

Steam Link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/482460/
If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
